TcpKnnH 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Extract Label Space from Cross-Validation Folds

    labelSpace.Rd

    This function extracts the label space from multiple folds of a dataset during cross-validation. It loads the label data for each fold and returns the label names and corresponding values.

    labelSpace(parameters)

    Arguments

    parameters

    A list containing necessary parameters, including: Folders$folderCVTRPath to the training fold files dataset_nameBase name of the dataset files ds$LabelStartStarting column index of labels ds$LabelEndEnding column index of labels number_foldsTotal number of cross-validation folds

    Value

    A list with:

    NamesLabels

    A vector of label names

    Classes

    A list where each element corresponds to label values for a fold

    Examples

    parameters <- list(
  Folders = list(folderCVTR = "path/to/folds"),
  dataset_name = "my_dataset",
  ds = list(LabelStart = 5, LabelEnd = 10),
  number_folds = 10
)
result <- labelSpace(parameters)
#> Error in labelSpace(parameters): object 'number_folds' not found
print(result$NamesLabels)  # Output: Label names
#> Error: object 'result' not found
